definition: to help a mother give birth

sentences.english: Once they left, I called my midwife.
sentences.chinese: 她們一離開，我就電話叫來了助產士。

sentences.english: I almost felt like you wanted to call this book Midwives Matter.
sentences.chinese: 我幾乎覺得你想叫這本書助產士物。

sentences.english: Finally, my midwife arrived, along with her daughter.
sentences.chinese: 最終，我的助產士到了，來的還有她的女兒。
他們得去上心理助產課。

sentences.english: Midwives must reach the babbling fool status before you foal out.
sentences.chinese: 助產士必須滿了你的小馬駒在胡說傻瓜地位。

sentences.english: A trained midwife helped save a newborn in the village of Suenebok Lhong in Aceh.
sentences.chinese: 經過培訓的助產士使亞齊村裏的一個初生兒得以存活。

sentences.english: Bridget Lynch, is the president of the International Confederation of Midwives.
sentences.chinese: 布里奇特林奇，是國際助產士聯合會主席。

sentences.english: Effleurage of the abdomen is used in the lamaze method of childbirth.
sentences.chinese: 腹部輕撫法是用於孕婦的心理助產法。

sentences.english: I called my midwife, who could get to our place in 20 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 我給助產士打了電話，她將在20分鐘內趕到我家。

sentences.english: Jauniwati believes being a midwife is her life’s calling, and she trains other midwives in Indonesia.
sentences.chinese: 瓊尼瓦提堅信，做一名助產士是她生命的召喚。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the better method of protecting perineum in delivery.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討助產中更好地保護會陰的操作手法。

sentences.english: As a midwife and mother, I’ve experienced the joy of birth.
sentences.chinese: 作爲助產士和母親，我體會過新生命到來的喜悅。

sentences.english: The Comintern plaid a rule of "midwife and guardian" in this process.
sentences.chinese: 共產國際在這一過程中扮演了助產士和監護人的角色。

sentences.english: Smellie improved the forceps and wrote a bestselling practical midwifery handbook.
sentences.chinese: 斯梅利改良了產鉗，並寫下了實用的助產術手冊。

sentences.english: The bank also sends collection instructions to the physician monitoring the pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 臍血站還會給助產醫師寄發託收指示。
那位助產護士給她妹妹接生。

definition: medical doctor/physician who works primarily by administering drugs, as opposed to surgeon 外科醫生|外科医生[wai4 ke1 yi1 sheng1]
